name: part_014
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY2】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade hololive stage DAY2【チラ見せ】 [lZGqBUSvF4s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs her song and interacts with the crowd at hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade.
Nakiri Ayame takes the stage, introduces her new song, and performs it.

subtitles.original: Hirogarimashou my happy day
subtitles.english: Let's spread my happy day

subtitles.original: はじまるよ　今日は何をして遊びましょうか？
subtitles.english: It's starting! What shall we do for fun today?

subtitles.original: お茶でも飲んでひと息いってライブ二日目！
subtitles.english: Let's have some tea, take a breath, and enjoy the second day of the live!

subtitles.original: 皆さんのこと　もっと知れたら私も幸せなのです
subtitles.english: Knowing more about all of you makes me happy too

subtitles.original: 突っ張ったり　アピールしたり　皆さんせーのでご一緒に！
subtitles.english: Let's push forward and appeal together on the count of three!

subtitles.original: 楽しくて　飛び跳ねる時も
subtitles.english: In moments of joy when we're jumping around

subtitles.original: 悲しくて　落ち込む時も
subtitles.english: And in moments of sadness when we're feeling down

subtitles.original: 皆さんのそばでちょっと
subtitles.english: Right by your side...

subtitles.original: 私がそこにいます
subtitles.english: ...I will always be there

subtitles.original: ハイ！ ハイ！ ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: さあ　今もずっと変わらない思いだから
subtitles.english: Now, because these feelings will never change

subtitles.original: 君と誰だって　どこだって welcome
subtitles.english: With you, anyone and anywhere is welcome

subtitles.original: ワクワク成長中
subtitles.english: Excitement is growing

subtitles.original: 同じ時を過ごす今が
subtitles.english: This moment we spend together

subtitles.original: 幸せなんですよ
subtitles.english: Is true happiness

subtitles.original: 泣いたって　しょげたって　大丈夫ジョーブ
subtitles.english: Even if you cry or feel blue, it's okay, okay

subtitles.original: 笑顔で一緒に　ハイ・ファイ・ファイ！
subtitles.english: With a smile, let's do a high-five! Five! Five!

subtitles.original: 輝く色重ねて
subtitles.english: Layering the shining colors

subtitles.original: 広げましょう my the new world
subtitles.english: Let's spread "my the new world"

subtitles.original: 大空も飛び越えて
subtitles.english: Flying beyond the great sky

subtitles.original: 世界を回ったら
subtitles.english: As we travel around the world

subtitles.original: いつの果てまでも
subtitles.english: Until the end of time

subtitles.original: 心通わせよう
subtitles.english: Let our hearts connect

subtitles.original: どこだって届けるよ
subtitles.english: I'll reach you anywhere

subtitles.original: いつだって知ってるよ
subtitles.english: I always know

subtitles.original: 誰だって繋がるよ
subtitles.english: Everyone can connect

subtitles.original: ここから始めよう
subtitles.english: Let's start from here

subtitles.original: さあ皆さん　サイリウムを上に！
subtitles.english: Now everyone, raise your penlights!

subtitles.original: 今日は幕張　みんなでせーの！
subtitles.english: Today is Makuhari! Everyone, on the count of three!

subtitles.original: サイリウムは　フリフリフリフリ
subtitles.english: Wave your penlights! Wave, wave, wave, wave!

subtitles.original: 推して押されて　お兄さんもお姉さんも
subtitles.english: Pushing and being pushed, brothers and sisters too!

subtitles.original: ここまでよくできました！
subtitles.english: You did a great job so far!

subtitles.original: 最後に一つ
subtitles.english: One last thing...

subtitles.original: 三千回でも足りないぞ　100万回愛してる！
subtitles.english: 3,000 times isn't enough, I love you a million times!

subtitles.original: これまでを支えてくれた
subtitles.english: To everyone who has supported me...

subtitles.original: 皆さんに寄り添いたいなって
subtitles.english: ...I want to stay close to you

subtitles.original: 大切な仲間たちとこれからも
subtitles.english: With my precious friends from now on too

subtitles.original: 今もずっと大好きなこの場所で
subtitles.english: In this place that I've always loved

subtitles.original: 君もいつだって　どこだって welcome
subtitles.english: You too, anytime and anywhere, welcome

subtitles.original: ワクワク更新中
subtitles.english: Excitement is updating

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ明日も未来も
subtitles.english: The unseen tomorrow and the future too

subtitles.original: 共に広げましょう
subtitles.english: Let's expand them together

subtitles.original: 泣いたって　しょげたって　大丈夫ジョーブ
subtitles.english: Even if you cry or feel blue, it's okay, okay

subtitles.original: 笑顔で一緒に　ハイ・ファイ・ファイ！
subtitles.english: With a smile, let's do a high-five! Five! Five!

subtitles.original: 心を歌に重ねて
subtitles.english: Layering our hearts into the song

subtitles.original: 届けましょう
subtitles.english: Let's deliver it

subtitles.original: 繋げましょう　いきましょう my shining world
subtitles.english: Let's connect, let's go, my shining world

subtitles.original: 楽しい時間をみんなと過ごせて本当に幸せです
subtitles.english: I'm truly happy to have spent this fun time with you all

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 愛してるぞ！
subtitles.english: I love you!

subtitles.original: Kei-ho!
subtitles.english: Kei-ho!

subtitles.original: Kei-yo! Yo! Yo! Yo!
subtitles.english: Kei-yo! Yo! Yo! Yo!

subtitles.original: よーし、新曲お披露目！行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Alright, new song reveal! Let's go!

subtitles.original: A-one, a-two, a-one two se-no!
subtitles.english: A-one, a-two, a-one two, go!

subtitles.original: あ、掛け声決めてなかった…
subtitles.english: Oh, I didn't decide on the call-and-response...

subtitles.original: そんなところも　カバ余余
subtitles.english: Even that part of me is cute-yo-yo

subtitles.original: 皆落着いて　こいこい
subtitles.english: Everyone, calm down and come, come

subtitles.original: 共に暴走して　おいおい
subtitles.english: Let's run wild together, oi oi

subtitles.original: 赤裸歌えば　よいよい
subtitles.english: If we sing frankly, it's good, good

subtitles.original: この道を進むのだ
subtitles.english: Proceed on this path

subtitles.original: あーでもね　疲れたらゆっくりと歩みましょう
subtitles.english: Ah, but you know, if you're tired, let's walk slowly

subtitles.original: 人生なんて気楽に構えましょう
subtitles.english: Let's take life easy

subtitles.original: なんてやってたら　ちゃんとしのって
subtitles.english: While doing that, "do it properly"...

subtitles.original: どっちどっちどっち…どっちの君は大正解
subtitles.english: Which one, which one... whichever one you are is correct

subtitles.original: だってこの世は　めちゃかわ余
subtitles.english: Because this world is super cute-yo

subtitles.original: 駄目なとこも　のーかわ余
subtitles.english: Even the bad parts are cute-yo

subtitles.original: 生まれてきてくれて　ありがとめ
subtitles.english: Thank you for being born

subtitles.original: 皆だいだいだいだい　大好きかわ余
subtitles.english: I love you all so, so, so much, cute-yo

subtitles.original: ねーねーそんな　この世はかわ余
subtitles.english: Hey hey, such a world is cute-yo

subtitles.original: 出合い別れで　君かわ余
subtitles.english: Meetings and partings make you cute-yo

subtitles.original: あばくさまにラブだから
subtitles.english: Because it's an overwhelming love

subtitles.original: あまりあるかわ余　作りましょう
subtitles.english: Let's make lots of cute-yo

subtitles.original: あまり振り回しすぎたる
subtitles.english: If I swing it around too much...

subtitles.original: もしかして呆れられちゃうかも
subtitles.english: ...you might get disappointed

subtitles.original: 取り澄みで愛してほしいな
subtitles.english: I want you to love me forever

subtitles.original: そんなところも　かわ余余
subtitles.english: Even that part of me is cute-yo-yo
